name: The Go-Between
summary_text: A tale of torrid and forbidden love between a couple in the English countryside.

name: Coup de Torchon
summary_text: A pathetic police chief, humiliated by everyone around him, suddenly wants a clean slate in life - and resorts to drastic means to do so.

name: Hellfighters
summary_text: The telling of Chance Buckman an oil rig fire fighter who becomes hospitalized and has to come to grips with how his job interfered with his marriage, after being laid up in a hospital bed ...                See full summary »

name: The Walker
summary_text: An escort who caters to Washington, D.C.'s society ladies becomes involved in a murder case.

name: Kings of the Road
summary_text: A traveling projection-equipment mechanic works in Western Germany along the East-German border, visiting worn-out theatres. He meets with a depressed young man whose marriage has just broken up, and the two decide to travel together.

name: An Affair of Love
summary_text: A woman puts an ad in a magazine looking for a man to fulfill her fantasy of a stringless, anonymous pornographic affair.

name: A Scene at the Sea
summary_text: The lives of a young, hearing-impaired and gloomy couple are fulfilled after the boy holds interest in surfboarding.

name: Moving
summary_text: Arlo accepts what seems to him to be a dream promotion to Idaho. He soon discovers, however, that moving has its own share of problems.

name: Panga
summary_text: Panga is inspired from the life of a national level Kabbadi player from India. It follows her triumphs, struggle and overcoming of stereotypes. It shows how important the love and support of your family is for you to be successful.

name: Northfork
summary_text: Set in 1955, the residents of a small Montana community are forced to move their homes to make way for a new dam.

name: Cromwell
summary_text: Oliver Cromwell can no longer tolerate King Charles' policies, and the self-interest of the ruling class, and leads a civil war to install Parliament as the ultimate ruler of England.

name: Jannat 2
summary_text: A dealer of illegal guns is bullied into being an informer for a cop who wants to put an end to this racket.

name: Tales from the Golden Age
summary_text: Several urban legends of Communist Romania are dramatized.

name: Fatale
summary_text: After a one-night stand, a successful married man finds himself entangled in a cunning police detective's latest investigation.

name: Abbott and Costello Meet the Mummy
summary_text: Two bumbling Americans stumble on the discovery of a lifetime when their search for a mummy leads them to a sacred medallion that holds the key to buried treasure.

name: Melody Time
summary_text: An anthology of animated vignettes set to contemporary music.

name: The Silence of the Hams
summary_text: The federal agent Joe Dee Fostar is currently investigating a serial killer, helped by doctor Animal who is isolated in a maximum security jail.

name: Ugramm
summary_text: A man with a dangerous past must protect a girl from those who are hell bent on killing her.

name: My American Uncle
summary_text: The intersecting stories of three people who face difficult choices in life-changing situations are used to illustrate the theories espoused by Henri Laborit about human behavior and the relationship between the self and society.

name: Cheyenne Autumn
summary_text: The Cheyenne, tired of broken U.S. government promises, head for their ancestral lands but a sympathetic cavalry officer is tasked to bring them back to their reservation.

name: A Tale of Two Cities
summary_text: A pair of lookalikes, one a former French aristocrat and the other an alcoholic English lawyer, fall in love with the same woman amongst the turmoil of the French Revolution.

name: Tekken: Blood Vengeance
summary_text: High school student Ling Xiaoyu is recruited by Anna Williams of G Corporation to transfer to Kyoto University and gather information on a student named Shin Kamiya.

name: Leprechaun: Origins
summary_text: Not related to the previous Leprechain films. Two young couples backpacking through Ireland discover that one of Ireland's most famous legends is a terrifying reality.

name: Chandramukhi
summary_text: Creepy happenings in an abandoned mansion are attributed to the ghost of an ancient courtesan, back for revenge

name: Comrades, Almost a Love Story
summary_text: Two Chinese-mainlanders living in Hong Kong form a close friendship. Over the years this grows into love, but there are obstacles.

name: The Baby's Room
summary_text: In Spain, the sports journalist Juan has a perfect life with his wife Sonia: they have just had a baby and moved to an old house that needs to be repaired in a fancy neighborhood. When ...                See full summary »

name: 52 Pick-Up
summary_text: A secret fling between a man and his mistress leads to blackmail and murder.

name: First Men in the Moon
summary_text: When a spaceship lands on the moon, it is hailed as a new accomplishment, before it becomes clear that a Victorian party completed the journey in 1899, leading investigators to that mission's last survivor.

name: The Lost Future
summary_text: After a global cataclysm, mankind has degraded to a tribal society. In one of the tribes there is a disagreement about what is the best way to survive.

name: Giallo
summary_text: In Italy, a woman fears her sister may have been kidnapped. Inspector Enzo Avolfi fears it's worse. They team up to rescue her from a sadistic killer known only as Yellow.

name: Nemesis
summary_text: Alex, a burned out LA cyborg cop, is forced by commissioner Farnsworth to find his former cyborg partner and lover Jared who's about to deliver sensitive data to cyborg terrorists who wish to wage war against humans. Is he being played?

name: A Farewell to Arms
summary_text: An American ambulance driver and an English nurse fall in love in Italy during World War I.

name: Birds of America
summary_text: A regular guy struggles with a repressive home and professional life, as well as making amends for the trouble his free-spirited brother and sister cause about town.

name: The Restaurant
summary_text: Top-notch french restaurant owner Monsieur Septime is involved into crime when one of his famous guests disappears.

name: Miss Julie
summary_text: Over the course of a midsummer night in Fermanagh in 1890, an unsettled daughter of the Anglo-Irish aristocracy encourages her father's valet to seduce her.

name: In Which We Serve
summary_text: This "story of a ship", the British destroyer H.M.S. Torrin, is told in flashbacks by survivors as they cling to a life raft.

name: Range 15
summary_text: Veterans wake up after a night of partying to find out that the zombie apocalypse has spread across the United States.

name: Post Tenebras Lux
summary_text: Juan and his urban family live in the Mexican countryside, where they enjoy and suffer a world apart. And nobody knows if these two worlds are complementary or if they strive to eliminate one another.

name: Pappa pia
summary_text: A boat house unites the old and young people of a community together.

name: Möbius
summary_text: An FSB officer falls in love with his agent, an American woman, who works as a trader in a Russian bank.

name: Tarzan the Ape Man
summary_text: While on an African expedition with her father, Jane Parker meets Tarzan, and the two become fascinated by each other.

name: Ulzana's Raid
summary_text: After fierce war chief Ulzana and a small war party jump the reservation bent on murder and terror, an inexperienced young lieutenant is assigned to track him down.

name: Surf Nazis Must Die
summary_text: When the son of a gun-wielding woman is murdered by neo-Nazi surf punks in the post-apocalyptic future, his Mama hunts them down for some bloodthirsty revenge.

name: Yao a yao, yao dao wai po qiao
summary_text: A provincial boy related to a Shanghai crime family is recruited by his uncle into cosmopolitan Shanghai in the 1930s to be a servant to a ganglord's mistress.

name: Clean, Shaven
summary_text: After a man suffering from schizophrenia is released from a mental institution, he attempts to get his daughter back from her adoptive family.

name: Pennies from Heaven
summary_text: During the Great Depression, a sheet-music salesman seeks to escape his dreary life through popular music and a love affair with an innocent schoolteacher.

name: Sweet Charity
summary_text: Taxi dancer Charity continues to have Faith despite endless disappointments at its hands, and Hope that she will finally meet the man to romance her away from her sleazy life. Maybe, just maybe, handsome Oscar will be the one to do it.

name: Recoil
summary_text: A cop turns vigilante after his family is murdered, exacting vengeance on the killers - and then on all criminals who have slipped through the system.

name: Sseo-ni
summary_text: Seven girls become good friends in high school, then events pull them apart for 25 years. When one of the friends lies dying in a hospital, she wishes to see each of them one last time.

name: Band Aid
summary_text: A couple who can't stop fighting embark on a last-ditch effort to save their marriage: turning their fights into songs and starting a band.

name: Oranges and Sunshine
summary_text: Set in 1980s Nottingham, social worker Margaret Humphreys holds the British government accountable for child migration schemes and reunites the children involved -- now adults living mostly in Australia -- with their parents in Britain.

name: Daylight's End
summary_text: Following an outbreak that turned most of mankind into vampire-zombie-like creatures, the few survivors have to fight the creatures and marauders.

name: Phas Gaye Re Obama
summary_text: Om Shastri, a recession victim comes to India to sell his ancestors property to clear is debt. On reaching he comes to know that selling the property will make his family homeless in India. Later he is kidnapped by goons thinking a rich NRI.

name: Legend No. 17
summary_text: Biopic of Russian ice hockey legend Valeri Kharlamov from early childhood, rising to the pinnacle of the sport and his untimely death.

name: Mausam
summary_text: A war, religious conflicts, and misunderstandings create obstacles for a couple of different faiths.

name: South Central
summary_text: A former gangster fresh out of prison wants to change his life for the better and must save his 10 year old son who has already chosen a gang life.

name: The Comedy of Terrors
summary_text: Dishonest undertaker Waldo Trumbull and his sidekick Felix Gillie are creating their own customers when they cannot find willing ones.

name: The Dark Hours
summary_text: A beautiful but burnt out psychiatrist goes to the family's winter cottage for a weekend with her husband and sister, which is interrupted when a terrifying and unexpected guest arrives, a violent sex offender and patient of the doctor.

name: He Walked by Night
summary_text: This film-noir piece, told in semi-documentary style, follows police on the hunt for a resourceful criminal who shoots and kills a cop.

name: The Marrying Man
summary_text: A millionaire playboy goes into Las Vegas and comes out married to a woman he barely knows.

name: Tabu: A Story of the South Seas
summary_text: On the South Pacific island of Bora Bora, a young couple's love is threatened when the tribal chief declares the girl a sacred virgin.

name: An Elephant Sitting Still
summary_text: Four people in a Chinese city live through a complicated day as their lives intersect.

name: Kevin Hart: Seriously Funny
summary_text: "Seriously Funny" stars Kevin Hart performing in front of a sold out crowd live from Cleveland, Ohio - where he delivers his hilarious and unique brand of comedy. In this unforgettable ...                See full summary »

name: Body Shots
summary_text: A tale of the mysterious, but necessary, mating ritual between men and women of today and everything they think about sex but are afraid to say.

name: Krippendorf's Tribe
summary_text: An anthropologist creates a fictitious lost New Guinea tribe using his family members to cover-up for his mis-use of grant moneys.

name: Tower Block
summary_text: Several months after witnessing a murder, residents of Tower Block 31 find themselves being picked off by a sniper, pitting those lucky enough to be alive into a battle for survival.

name: The Inevitable Defeat of Mister & Pete
summary_text: A coming-of-age story about two inner city boys who are left to fend for themselves over the summer after their mothers are taken away by the authorities.

name: Wise Blood
summary_text: Fresh out of the army, Hazel Motes attempts to open the first Church Without Christ in the small town of Taulkinham.

name: Viy
summary_text: An eighteenth century English cartographer, Jonathan Green, sets out on a journey to map the uncharted lands of Transylvania, only to discover the dark secrets and dangerous creatures hidden in a cursed, fantastical Romanian forest.

name: Iceman
summary_text: A prehistoric Neanderthal man found frozen in ice is revived by an arctic exploration team, who then attempt to use him for their own scientific means.

name: Blood for Dracula
summary_text: An ailing vampire count travels to Italy with his servant to find a bride.

name: Boys Town
summary_text: When a death row prisoner tells him he wouldn't have led a life of crime if only he had had one friend as a child, Father Edward Flanagan decides to start a home for young boys.

name: The Importance of Being Earnest
summary_text: When Algernon discovers that his friend, Ernest, has created a fictional brother for whenever he needs a reason to escape dull country life, Algernon poses as the brother, resulting in ever increasing confusion.

name: Komt een vrouw bij de dokter
summary_text: A serial adulterer faces his demons when his loving wife falls severely ill.

name: How to Eat Fried Worms
summary_text: During the first day of his new school year, a fifth grade boy squares off against a bully and winds up accepting a dare that could change the balance of power within the class.

name: Yazgi
summary_text: Musa, who works as a bookkeeper in the customs office, believes in the emptiness and absurdity of life. He doesn't struggle to change his life; he lets himself flow along with events ...                See full summary »

name: Maattrraan
summary_text: Conjoined twins Vimalan and Akhilan involve themselves in a series of deaths involving their father's company. However, the truths that they initially uncover lead to a bigger conspiracy, one that spans across the globe.

name: Sorry to Disturb
summary_text: Hassan, a brilliant aviation engineer struggles with loneliness and depression while trying to design his exceptional project.

name: Get on the Bus
summary_text: A disparate group of African-American men travel by bus to Washington, DC for the Million Man March.

name: Starship Troopers: Traitor of Mars
summary_text: Federation trooper, Johnny Rico's ordered to work with a group of new recruits on a satellite station on Mars, where giant bugs have decided to target their next attack.

name: Harry and Tonto
summary_text: When his apartment building is torn down, a retired lifelong New Yorker goes on a cross-country odyssey with his beloved cat Tonto.

name: Escaping Tel Aviv
summary_text: An Egyptian woman discovers that her husband is in fact a Jewish Mossad agent working for Israel. He takes her and their two children to Israel by force and tries to convince her to live ...                See full summary »

name: Angel
summary_text: The rise and fall of a young eccentric British writer, in the early 20th century.

name: Zeiten ändern Dich
summary_text: The life story of German gangsta rapper, Bushido.

name: Goemon
summary_text: Based on a Japanese folk legend that echoes the tale of Robin Hood, this ninja thriller follows the exploits of Goemon Ishikawa (Yôsuke Eguchi), who leaves his fighting clan after its chief...                See full summary »

name: Maborosi
summary_text: A young woman's husband apparently commits suicide without warning or reason, leaving behind his wife and infant.

name: Burial Ground: The Nights of Terror
summary_text: An archaeology professor discovers an ancient crypt which contains living dead corpses. The zombies go on a rampage and attack a group of people which the professor had invited to celebrate his discovery.

name: The Hunter
summary_text: Bounty hunter Ralph "Papa" Thorson is receiving death threats from a criminal he helped put away. This while his girlfriend is about to give birth, an event he isn't looking forward to.

name: The Truth
summary_text: A stormy reunion between scriptwriter Lumir with her famous mother and actress, Fabienne, against the backdrop of Fabienne's autobiographic book and her latest role in a Sci-Fi picture as a daughter of a mother who never grows old.

name: Kárhozat
summary_text: A lonely barfly falls in love with a married bar singer.

name: Glorious 39
summary_text: The adopted daughter of a privileged British politician uncovers a family secret in the weeks leading up to World War II.

name: Frankie & Alice
summary_text: A drama centered on a go-go dancer with multiple personality disorder who struggles to remain her true self and begins working with a psychotherapist to uncover the mystery of the inner ghosts that haunt her.

name: Five Graves to Cairo
summary_text: In the North African campaign a British straggler manages to pass himself off as a waiter at the hotel commandeered as Rommel's headquarters. He has thoughts of assassinating Rommel but his cover may have an even better use.

name: Shanghai Kiss
summary_text: An Asian-American actor, living in Los Angeles, is forced to reconsider his roots as well as the possibilities afforded him by his present situation after suddenly inheriting his grandmother's home in Shanghai.

name: Horatio Hornblower: The Duel
summary_text: Horatio Hornblower begins his naval career, but a deadly feud with a despicable mate is causing complications.

name: Boudu Saved from Drowning
summary_text: A bookseller saves a tramp from drowning and shelters him, but the tramp's odd behavior starts to wear everyone down.

name: Indian Summer
summary_text: Seven friends reunite for a week-long reunion at a summer camp in Ontario they used to attend as children which is now threatened with being closed down.

name: The Face of Love
summary_text: A widow falls for a guy who bears a striking resemblance to her late husband.

name: The Apple Dumpling Gang
summary_text: Three orphan children strike gold in 1878 California.

name: My Masterpiece
summary_text: Arturo is an unscrupulous art dealer and Renzo his socially-awkward painter and longtime friend. Willing to risk it all, they develop an extreme and ludicrous plan to save themselves.

name: Pat and Mike
summary_text: Pat is a women's sports sensation unless her fiancé is around. Her new shady manager Mike keeps them apart and develops feelings for her.

name: Jai Lava Kusa
summary_text: Sidelined at a very young age due to stammering, the eldest of identical triplets develops hatred for his younger brothers and creates havoc in their lives as they all reunite as adults.

name: Let It Ride
summary_text: A nosy cab driver gets a hot tip on a race horse and wins big, but he can't seem to stop gambling. Will he go broke or walk home with a pretty penny?

name: Strange Circus
summary_text: The erotic novelist Taeko is writing a morbid story of a family destroyed by incest, murder and abuse. Her assistant, Yuji, sets on a mission to uncover the reality of this story, but the reality might be too much to bear.

name: Strictly Sexual
summary_text: Two successful women, sick and tired of dating and relationships, decide to keep two young men in their pool house for strictly sexual purposes.

name: The Phantom of the Opera
summary_text: Gory remake of the Gaston Leroux classic story, only this time, the phantom is not disfigured, but a man who was raised by rats deep under the Paris Opera House.

name: Madman
summary_text: A legendary psychopathic murderer stalks a summer camp.

name: Die Fremde
summary_text: Umay is a young woman of Turkish descent, fighting for an independent and self-determined life in Germany against the resistance of her family. Her struggle initiates a dynamic, which results in a life-threatening situation.

name: Citizen Toxie: The Toxic Avenger IV
summary_text: The Toxic Avenger must defend his friends from his own evil alternate universe doppelgänger, The Noxious Offender.

name: Impractical Jokers: The Movie
summary_text: The story of a humiliating high school mishap from 1992 that sends the Impractical Jokers on the road competing in hidden-camera challenges for the chance to turn back the clock and redeem three of the four Jokers.

name: Christmas Wedding Planner
summary_text: While planning her cousin's lavish wedding, Kelsey Wilson's world is turned upside down when Private Investigator Connor McClean shows up. Connor, hired by a unnamed source, disrupts the upcoming nuptials but manages to win Kelsey's heart.

name: In Their Skin
summary_text: The Hughes' cottage vacation is violently interrupted by a family on a murderous and identity-stealing journey, in search of the "perfect" life.

name: Thadam
summary_text: The murder of a youngster creates confusion among cops when they discover the suspect has a lookalike.

name: Anatomy of Hell
summary_text: A woman employs a gay man to spend four nights at her house to watch her when she's "unwatchable".

name: Read It and Weep
summary_text: A shy and retiring high school student develops a peculiar alter ego that changes her life forever.

name: Elvis and Anabelle
summary_text: Dying after being crowned Miss Texas Rose, Anabelle comes alive just before Elvis embalms her. He does his ailing dad's work. Anabelle later returns to the embalmer's farm to get away from her mom and be happy.

name: End Game
summary_text: A secret Service agent and a news reporter investigate the conspiracy behind the assassination of the President.

name: R-Point
summary_text: During the Vietnam War, a South Korean base receives a radio transmission from a missing squad, presumed dead, and sends a platoon to rescue the lost squad from the R-Point.

name: The People Vs. Fritz Bauer
summary_text: The story of the man who brought high-ranking German Nazi criminal Adolf Eichmann to justice.

name: 7 Kocali Hürmüz
summary_text: Remake of a well-known Turkish musical comedy loved by generations, the film is about the adventures of flirtatious Hurmuz in late 1800's Istanbul. Hurmuz who lives in Taskasap, Istanbul ...                See full summary »

name: Jar City
summary_text: A murder opens up a bleak trail of long buried secrets and small town corruption for a worn out police detective and his squad.

name: Crimewave
summary_text: A pair of whacked-out cartoon-like exterminator/hitmen kill the owner of a burglar-alarm company, and stalk the partner who hired them, his wife, and a nerd framed for the murder, who tells the story in flashback from the electric chair.

name: The Hot Rock
summary_text: Dortmunder and his pals plan to steal a huge diamond from a museum. But this turns out to be only the first time they have to steal it...

name: For the Boys
summary_text: U.S. entertainer Eddie Sparks wants to bring some fun to the soldiers during World War II and contacts singer/dancer Dixie Leonard for help. They become the perfect team and tour from North...                See full summary »

name: A Dry White Season
summary_text: A white middle class South African suburbanite with no interest in politics agrees to help his black gardener find his jailed son. His investigation opens his eyes to the horrors committed by the secret police and turns him into a target.

name: Zemlya
summary_text: In the peaceful countryside, Vassily opposes the rich kulaks over the coming of collective farming.

name: The Mistress of Spices
summary_text: An immigrant in San Francisco brings the Indian magic with her thru spices. To keep the magic, she can never leave the spice store or touch another's skin. One day, a handsome architect bachelor enters her store.

name: After
summary_text: When two bus crash survivors awake to discover that they are the only people left in their town, they work together to unravel the truth behind the strange events.

name: My Boy Jack
summary_text: Author Rudyard Kipling and his wife search for their 18-year-old son after he goes missing during World War I.

name: Becoming Astrid
summary_text: Biopic of Swedish writer Astrid Lindgren, the author of numerous children's books and creator of Pippi Longstocking.

name: La Vie de Bohème
summary_text: Three struggling artists try to make passable livings in Paris despite knock backs and tragedies.

name: The Tin Star
summary_text: A cynical former sheriff turned bounty hunter helps a young, recently appointed acting sheriff with his advice, his experience and his gun.

name: Shaandaar
summary_text: In the backdrop of a destination wedding in London, two families try to save their respective empires, unbeknownst to each other.

name: Brannigan
summary_text: Chicago Police Lieutenant Jim Brannigan is sent to the U.K. to escort organized crime boss Ben Larkin back to the U.S., but Larkin's hitmen prepare an ambush for Brannigan.

name: Quai des Orfèvres
summary_text: A flirtatious wife runs off to meet an older man and the husband closes in with intend to murder him, but finds the deed already done.

name: Mountains May Depart
summary_text: The life of Tao, and those close to her, is explored in three different time periods: 1999, 2014, and 2025.

name: L'odyssée
summary_text: The aquatic adventure of the highly influential and fearlessly ambitious pioneer, innovator, filmmaker, researcher, and conservationist, Jacques-Yves Cousteau, covers roughly thirty years of an inarguably rich in achievements life.

name: Unpregnant
summary_text: A 17-year old Missouri teen named Veronica discovers she has gotten pregnant, a development that threatens to end her dreams of matriculating at an Ivy League college, and the career that will follow.

name: The Mambo Kings
summary_text: Two Cuban brothers bring a new music to the 1950s USA. They are as different as the problems that await them.

name: Silent Rage
summary_text: A sheriff tries to stop the killing spree of a silent maniacal murderer who, as the result of secret genetic experimentation by an unethical scientist, has the ability to self-heal.

name: Salaam-E-Ishq
summary_text: Six couples in love must face different problems caused by love itself. Do they resolve their issues and face life anew, or do they succumb under pressure ?

name: Sangharsh
summary_text: A rookie CBI officer must enlist the help of an incarcerated criminal in order to catch a serial child killer, who has recently escaped police custody.

name: A Simple Wish
summary_text: A bumbling fairy godfather tries to grant a girl's wish that her cabby father lands a Broadway role.

name: In Like Flint
summary_text: Super-spy Flint takes on a cabal of women plotting to rule the world.

name: Hard to Be a God
summary_text: In the distant future, a space traveler from Earth breaks a special law and interferes with the history of another, Medieval-like, planet.

name: The Dinosaur Project
summary_text: A British expedition formed by the lead researcher Jonathan Marchant, his assistant, a doctor and a TV crew, travels to Congo to seek evidence of a dinosaur.

name: Faust
summary_text: A despairing scholar sells his soul to Satan in exchange for one night with a beautiful young woman.

name: Ice Cold in Alex
summary_text: During World War II in North Africa, a medical field unit must cross the desert in their ambulance in order to reach the British lines in Alexandria.

name: The Guardian
summary_text: A young couple with a newborn baby don't realize that the nanny they hired is a magical nymph who sacrifices infants to an evil tree.

name: Support Your Local Gunfighter
summary_text: A con artist arrives in a mining town controlled by two competing companies. Both companies think he's a famous gunfighter and try to hire him to drive the other out of town.

name: The Country Bears
summary_text: Beary Barrington goes on an adventure to save Country Bear Hall by getting the Country Bears back together for a reunion concert.

name: Clash
summary_text: Set entirely in an 8m police truck, a number of detainees from different political and social backgrounds are brought together by fate, during the turmoil that followed the ousting of former president Morsi from power.

name: Capital
summary_text: The newly appointed CEO of a giant European investment bank works to hold on to his power when an American hedge fund company tries to buy out his company.

name: Do Dooni Chaar
summary_text: A middle class family in India tries to buy a new car.

name: Avellaneda's Moon
summary_text: The story of a social and sports club in a Buenos Aires neighborhood and of those who try to save it from being closed.

name: Across 110th Street
summary_text: Two New York City cops go after amateur crooks who are trying to rip off the Mafia and start a gang war.

name: Gardens of Stone
summary_text: A Sergeant must deal with his desires to save the lives of young soldiers being sent to Viet Nam. Continuously denied the chance to teach the soldiers about his experiences, he settles for trying to help the son of an old Army buddy.

name: Cutter's Way
summary_text: Richard spots a man dumping a body, and decides to expose the man he thinks is the culprit with his friend Alex Cutter.

name: Look at Me
summary_text: A french girl gifted with a great voice, has a complex about her weight and her appearance.

name: The Care Bears Movie
summary_text: The Care Bears team up with a troubled brother and sister who just moved to a new town, to help a neglected young sorcerer's apprentice whose evil magic book causes sinister things to happen.

name: Mio min Mio
summary_text: A lonely boy who is transferred from his dull life with his adoptive parents to the land where his real father is the King. In that country, he sets out on a quest, together with his new friend, to destroy the evil Knight Kato.

name: Murder by Decree
summary_text: Sherlock Holmes investigates the murders commited by Jack the Ripper and discovers a conspiracy to protect the killer.

name: Go West
summary_text: The Marx Brothers come to the rescue in the Wild West when a young man, trying to settle an old family feud so he can marry the girl he loves, runs afoul of crooks.

name: Babylon 5: Thirdspace
summary_text: The crew of Babylon 5 discover an ancient artifact floating in hyperspace.

name: Diplomacy
summary_text: A historical drama that depicts the relationship between Dietrich von Choltitz, the German military governor of occupied Paris, and Swedish consul-general Raoul Nordling.

name: Once Upon a Forest
summary_text: A young mouse, mole and hedgehog risk their lives to find a cure for their badger friend, who's been poisoned by men.

name: Black Moon
summary_text: To escape a gender war, a girl flees to a remote farmhouse and becomes part of an extensive family's unusual, perhaps even supernatural, lifestyle.

name: A Canterbury Tale
summary_text: Three modern day pilgrims investigate a bizarre crime in a small town on the way to Canterbury.

name: Thaanaa Serndha Koottam
summary_text: Angered by the corruption that stopped him from becoming a CBI officer, a young man forms a gang who pose as CBI officers and raids the corrupt.

name: Tropical Malady
summary_text: A romance between a soldier and a country boy, wrapped around a Thai folk-tale involving a shaman with shape-shifting abilities.

name: Casque d'Or
summary_text: Three gangsters and an ex-con carpenter all fall for the same beautiful, golden-haired woman in Belle Époque France.

name: Final Portrait
summary_text: The story of Swiss painter and sculptor Alberto Giacometti.

name: The Runner
summary_text: In the aftermath of the 2010 BP oil spill, an idealistic but flawed politician is forced to confront his dysfunctional life after his career is destroyed in a sex scandal.

name: Reality
summary_text: Luciano is a charming fishmonger whose unexpected and sudden obsession with being a contestant on a reality show leads him down a rabbit hole of skewed perceptions and paranoia.

name: A Simple Twist of Fate
summary_text: His life was emotionally closed off from the world, until an orphaned baby showed up at his house.

name: Çogunluk
summary_text: Mertkan has a simple life in Istanbul: 'working' as an office-boy in his dad's construction company, hanging out with his male friends in malls and discos, cruising with his dad's 4-wheel ...                See full summary »

name: Maskeli Besler: Intikam Pesinde
summary_text: A Turkish comedy film directed by Murat Aslan, about an incompetent gang of criminals attempting the biggest robbery of their lives, which was the sixth highest-grossing Turkish film of 2005.

name: Carrington
summary_text: The platonic relationship between artist Dora Carrington (Dame Emma Thompson) and writer Lytton Strachey (Jonathan Pryce) in the early twentieth century.

name: Deadheads
summary_text: Two inexplicably coherent zombies awake amidst a zombie attack, and decide to take a road trip to find the one's lost love, unaware they are being chased by the agents of a ruthless company with its own agenda.

name: Passion Fish
summary_text: After an accident leaves her a paraplegic, a former soap opera star struggles to recover both emotionally and mentally, until she meets her newest nurse, who has struggles of her own.

name: Oasis
summary_text: A Scottish chaplain embarks on an epic journey through space.

name: Let's Be Friends!
summary_text: A young man in England regularly mails his childhood sweetheart in India is unaware that the replies he receives are written by another girl.

name: Paradise Road
summary_text: A group of women who are imprisoned on the island of Sumatra by the Japanese during World War II use music to relieve their misery.

name: Pressure
summary_text: A group of men are trapped in a small pod on the sea bed, after diving down to fix an oil pipeline and becoming separated from their ship.

name: The King and the Clown
summary_text: Two clowns living in Korea's Chosun Dynasty get arrested for staging a play that satirizes the king. They are dragged to the palace and threatened with execution but are given a chance to save their lives if they can make the king laugh.

name: Telefon
summary_text: A Russian officer is sent to the U.S. to try and stop sleeper agents who will mindlessly attack government entities when they hear certain coded words.

name: The Last Laugh
summary_text: When retired talent manager Al Hart is reunited with his first client, Buddy Green, a comic who quit show business 50 years ago, he convinces Buddy to escape their retirement community and hit the road for a cross-country comedy tour.

name: Pohwasogeuro
summary_text: The story of student-soldiers trying to protect a middle school during the early days of the Korean War.

name: Scenes of a Sexual Nature
summary_text: Sex and love. Some seek it, some need it, some spurn it, and some pay for it, but we're all involved in it. Set on one afternoon on Hampstead Heath, London, this movie investigates the minutiae of seven couples. What makes us tick?

name: Sometimes in April
summary_text: When the Hutu nationalists raised arms against their Tutsi countrymen in Rwanda in April 1994, the violent uprising marked the beginning of one of the darkest times in African history which resulted in the deaths of almost 800,000 people.

name: Shortcut to Happiness
summary_text: A down-and-out writer sells his soul to the Devil in exchange for fame and fortune.

name: The Doctor
summary_text: When a self-centered doctor is diagnosed with cancer, he becomes better able to empathize with his patients and appreciate a life outside his career.

name: Chain Letter
summary_text: A maniac murders teens when they refuse to forward chain mail.

name: The Private Lives of Elizabeth and Essex
summary_text: A depiction of the love/hate relationship between Queen Elizabeth I and Robert Devereux, the Earl of Essex.

name: The Mighty Quinn
summary_text: When police officer Xavier Quinn's childhood friend, Maubee, becomes associated with murder and a briefcase full of ten thousand dollar bills, The Mighty Quinn must clear his name. Or try to catch him, which could be even trickier.

name: The Chipmunk Adventure
summary_text: The Chipmunks compete with the Chipettes in a round the world race.

name: Two Moon Junction
summary_text: A young Southern débutante temporarily abandons her posh lifestyle and upcoming, semi-arranged marriage to have a lustful and erotic fling with a rugged drifter who works at a local carnival.

name: Lykke-Per
summary_text: A gifted engineer flees his austere roots to pursue wealth and success among Copenhagen's elite, but the pride propelling him threatens to be his ruin.

name: Hatred
summary_text: Despite being in love with a Ukrainian boy from the same village, Polish girl named Zosia is forced into marrying a wealthy widower. Soon World War II begins and ethnic tensions arise. Amidst the war chaos Zosia tries to survive.

name: Alaska
summary_text: While searching for their missing father in the mountains of Alaska, two siblings come across a baby polar bear on the run from a pair of poachers.

name: Albatross
summary_text: Beth, a bookish teenager, befriends Emilia, an aspiring novelist who has just arrived in town. Emilia soon begins an affair with Beth's father that threatens to have devastating consequences.

name: I Am Michael
summary_text: Based on the fascinating true-life story of Michael Glatze, a gay activist who becomes a Christian pastor after identifying as a heterosexual.

name: Breaking News
summary_text: After a disastrous failure to stop a robber gang, the police attempt to redeem themselves through a series of publicity stunts and shootouts.

name: Blindsided
summary_text: A reclusive, blind photojournalist lives quietly in a New York penthouse, until a smooth but sadistic criminal looking for a hidden fortune enters her life.

name: Daughters of Darkness
summary_text: While passing through a vacation resort, a newlywed couple encounters a mysterious, strikingly beautiful countess and her aide.

name: Jibeuro
summary_text: Seven-year-old Sang-woo is left with his grandmother in a remote village while his mother looks for work. Born and raised in the city, Sang-woo quickly comes into conflict with his ...                See full summary »

name: Love, Honor and Obey
summary_text: A north London postman who gets involved with a gang of criminals

name: Lady in the Lake
summary_text: The lady editor of a crime magazine hires Phillip Marlowe to find the wife of her boss. The private detective soon finds himself involved in murder.

name: Lizzie Borden Took an Ax
summary_text: In 1893 Massachusetts, Lizzie Andrew Borden is put on trial for murdering her father and stepmother with an ax.

name: Joker
summary_text: A space scientist working on a project to communicate with aliens visits a village called Paglapur. To improve the plight of the inhabitants of Paglapur, he comes up with a novel idea.

name: Iruvar
summary_text: A struggling actor and a writer-politician become friends as young men and rise to great heights in cinema and politics respectively. But when both become contenders for the top political post in the state, a rift develops between them.

name: Keoma
summary_text: A half-breed ex-Union gunfighter attempts to protect his plague-ridden hometown from being overridden by his racist half-brothers and a Confederate tyrant.

name: The Endless Trench
summary_text: 1936. A country taken by the fascism. A husband marked for the killing. A wife determined to all for saving him. An endless incarceration in his own home.

name: The Flying Scotsman
summary_text: The true story of Graeme Obree, the Champion cyclist who built his bicycle from old bits of washing machines who won his championship only to have his title stripped from him and his mental health problems which he has suffered since.

name: Scars of Dracula
summary_text: A young man, Paul Carlson, is on a trip and spends the night at Count Dracula's castle. He is murdered. After some time has passed, the young man's brother Simon comes to the small town where all the traces end to look for him.

name: Good Neighbours
summary_text: Victor is new to Montreal and attempts to make friends with the wheelchair-bound Spencer and the cat-loving Louise, but everybody is on edge with a serial killer terrorizing the neighborhood.

name: La grande séduction
summary_text: A much-needed boost, in the form of a new factory, is promised to the residents of the tiny fishing village St. Marie-La-Mauderne, provided they can lure a doctor to take up full-time residency on the island. Inspired, the villagers devise a scheme to make Dr. Christopher Lewis a local.

name: Deadline
summary_text: A screenwriter travels to an abandoned house to finish a script on time, but a series of strange events lead her to a psychological breakdown.

name: James Dean
summary_text: A biopic about the actor James Dean, whose stardom of the ultimate teenage rebel as well as the premature death made him a legend.

name: Les maîtres du temps
summary_text: Piel, a 7 or 8 year old boy, is alone on the desert planet Perdide, only survivor of an attack by giant hornets. Calling for help, Piel's father's friend Jaffar keeps contact with the kid ...                See full summary »

name: Tres bodas de más
summary_text: Ruth is a young researcher in a college. She was asking for three of her ex's weddings. Along the way she is trying to find her soulmate and for a companion to every wedding, she enlists the help of her new fellow assistant.

name: Aarakshan
summary_text: The decision by India's supreme court to establish caste-based reservations for jobs in education causes conflict between a teacher and his mentor.

name: The Poker House
summary_text: A dramatization of Lori Petty's teenage years spent in small town Iowa.

name: Walking on Sunshine
summary_text: Set to the music of popular hit songs from the 1980s. A beautiful coastal village, present day Italy. After a whirlwind romance, Maddie is preparing to marry gorgeous Italian Raf, and has ...                See full summary »

name: A Thousand Acres
summary_text: A family is torn apart after a father gives his valuable farm land to his daughters.

name: Hampstead
summary_text: An American widow finds unexpected love with a man living wild on Hampstead Heath when they take on the developers who want to destroy his home.

name: Bodied
summary_text: A progressive graduate student finds success and sparks outrage when his interest in battle rap as a thesis subject becomes a competitive obsession.

name: April 9th
summary_text: On April 9, 1940 Germany invaded Denmark. Based on real events - in Southern Jutland a military unit on bicycles was sent south to help hold back the Germans until reinforcement.

name: Way Down East
summary_text: A naive country girl is tricked into a sham marriage by a wealthy womanizer, then must rebuild her life despite the taint of having borne a child out of wedlock.

name: Heidi
summary_text: A story of a young girl who lives in the Swiss Alps with her goat herding Grandfather.

name: 4:44 Last Day on Earth
summary_text: A look at how a painter and a successful actor spend their last day together before the world comes to an end.

name: Wagons East
summary_text: In the 1860's Wild West, when a ragged bunch of misfit settlers decide they cannot stand living in their current situation, they hire a grizzled cowboy to take them on a journey back to their hometowns east.

name: The Octagon
summary_text: A martial artist must defeat a plan by ninjas to create a worldwide training camp for terrorists.

name: As Cool as I Am
summary_text: A smart teenage girl comes of age in a small town with her self-centered parents who had her when they were teenagers.

name: Kaakha..Kaakha: The Police
summary_text: After a police team kills his brother, a drug-dealing gangster vows to kill the entire team and their respective families.

name: Sex Ed
summary_text: Eddie lands his first teaching gig at an inner city middle school and finds his highly pubescent pupils are receiving no form of sexual education. Eddie isn't really equipped to teach them...he's not exactly experienced romantically.

name: Naduvula Konjam Pakkatha Kaanom
summary_text: A young man forgets a few years of his life, even as he is about to get married.

name: Road to Morocco
summary_text: Two carefree castaways on a desert shore find an Arabian Nights city, where they compete for the luscious Princess Shalmar.

name: The Fantastic Four
summary_text: When dosed with cosmic rays, four intrepid explorers are given incredible powers.

name: Crime d'amour
summary_text: Ruthless executive Christine brings on young Isabelle as her assistant taking delight in toying with her innocence. But when Christine starts passing on her protege's ideas as her own, things take a dark turn.

name: Man with the Screaming Brain
summary_text: The brains of a Russian taxi driver and a wealthy businessman are brought together in one body by a mad scientist.

name: 2 Filhos de Francisco: A História de Zezé di Camargo & Luciano
summary_text: The story of Francisco, a very simple and poor man whose dream was to see his children become country music stars, and who made all the efforts to make it happen.

name: White Water Summer
summary_text: The story of a shy boy who gets convinced by his parents to spend a few summer days in the mountains. So, he joins a group, and the vacation begins. Unfortunately, things turn out to be a little tough for our small friend.

name: Sen Kimsin?
summary_text: Tekin (Tolga Cevik) and retired traffic police deputy Ismail (Koksal Engür), to find a girl who lost their lives at the expense of any kind of danger afford. An ordinary story that started ...                See full summary »

name: Lo chiamavano Bulldozer
summary_text: After his fishing boat is "periscoped", ex US footballer Bulldozer docks in an Italian port, where local criminals and American soldiers fight each other. Locals discover Bulldozer's talents and challenge the Yanks to a football game.

name: Night of the Demons 2
summary_text: High school students throw a Halloween party in a mansion haunted by a young demon.

name: Djúpið
summary_text: Based on actual events, a fisherman tries to survive in the freezing ocean after his boat capsizes off the south coast of Iceland.

name: Ed Gein
summary_text: The story of Ed Gein, who dug up the corpses of over a dozen women and made things out of their remains before finally shooting two people to death and butchering their bodies like beef sides.

name: Angamaly Diaries
summary_text: Vincent Pepe who wanted to be a powerful leader of a righteous gang that ruled the city, like his seniors. And then there's the rival clan with the malicious gangsters of Angamaly a locale on which the film is based.

name: Outpost: Black Sun
summary_text: The year is 1945, the closing stages of WW2, and a German scientist by the name of Klausener is working on a frightening new technology that has the power to create an immortal Nazi army. ...                See full summary »
